sentences.english: Analysis of a New Type Active Noise Cancellation Earmuffs.
sentences.chinese: 一種新型有源消聲耳罩的研究。

sentences.english: I said. "What will that man do with the earmuffs ?"
sentences.chinese: 那個人要耳罩幹什麼呢？

sentences.english: Wear earmuffs in designated areas of high noise levels on the rig site.
sentences.chinese: 在井場上的高噪音區要戴護耳罩。

sentences.english: Easy to use with safety helmet and ear defender.
sentences.chinese: 與安全帽和耳罩配套使用方便。

sentences.english: If blind people wear sunglasses, why don't deaf people wear earmuffs?
sentences.chinese: 盲人都戴墨鏡，聾人幹嘛不戴上耳罩？

sentences.english: Why does he need to wear the ear protector when he is working?
sentences.chinese: 當他在工作時他爲什麼需要戴上護耳罩？

sentences.english: The next thing he held up was a pair of earmuffs.
sentences.chinese: 下一件被拿出來的是一副防寒耳罩。

sentences.english: Mirror finish on the earcup should only be on the earcup surface and not on the edge.
sentences.chinese: 鏡面的拋光只限於耳罩表面，在邊緣並無打磨。

sentences.english: The optimum design of the controller of compound active noise cancellation earmuff is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 探討了複合式有源消聲耳罩的控制器的優化設計方法。

sentences.english: It's an amalgam slightly disarmed by pastel-colored earmuffs , but Sean is still clearly not to be messed with.
sentences.chinese: 卸下淡彩色禦寒耳罩，不過肖恩顯然仍沒有受到干擾。
